form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mrs. McCaskill (for herself and Mr. Burr) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for fairness in hospital payments under the Medicare program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Hospital Payment Fairness Act of 2015.

section.header: Sunset of Medicare hospital payment provision
section.text: Section 3141 of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (42 U.S.C. 1395ww note) is amended by inserting and before October 1, 2015, after October 1, 2010,.
